contents.text: Thank you for calling RGA Associates in San Francisco, your dedicated recruiting agency for high tech professionals.
If you are a job seeker exploring opportunities in San Francisco’s high tech industry, press 1.
To speak with one of our recruiting specialists, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a recruiting specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me to a recruiter to discuss high-tech job opportunities in San Francisco.
I'm transitioning from the military to tech and want to speak with a recruiter about opportunities in San Francisco.
Connect me with a recruiting specialist to discuss machine learning engineer openings in San Francisco.
I need help speaking with a recruiter about tech job opportunities in San Francisco.
I’d like to discuss entry‐level physics roles with a recruiter

contents.text: To submit your resume for review, press 2.
Please hold while we prepare your resume for review.

navigationGoals: Submit my resume for review for San Francisco tech positions.
I’d like to submit my resume for software engineering roles in San Francisco.
Submit my updated resume for backend developer positions at RGA Associates.
I want to send my CV for review by a recruiting specialist.
I want to send my resume for tech position consideration

contents.text: If you are an employer seeking top talent to grow your high tech team, press 2.
To post a new job opening with RGA Associates, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our job posting team.

navigationGoals: Post a new high-tech job opening with RGA Associates.
As a veteran entrepreneur, I need to post a new developer opening with your agency.
Post a new job requisition for a senior front-end engineer in the SF high-tech sector.
I’m looking to set up a new high-tech job listing with your agency.
I need to post a new research assistant job opening

contents.text: To speak with your account manager, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to your account manager.

navigationGoals: Speak with my account manager about our current recruiting campaign.
I need to speak with my account manager about the status of my current hiring search.
Connect me with my account manager to review our talent-pipeline metrics and billing.
I need to talk to my account manager about my recruiting services.
I’d like to speak with my RGA account manager
